import React from 'react'; import { Formik, Field, Form, ErrorMessage } from 'formik'; import * as Yup from 'yup'; const moment = require('moment'); import axios from 'axios'; class Adduserfun extends React.Component { render() { return ( { return moment().diff(moment(value), "years") >= 1; }), profileImg: Yup.mixed().required("image is Required") })} onSubmit={(values) => { // console.log(values); alert('SUCCESS!! :-)\n\n' + JSON.stringify(fields, null, 4)) axios.post('http://localhost:4000/users/add-user', values) .then(res => console.log(res.data)); alert("Form is validated! Submitting the form..."); }} render={({ errors, status, touched }) => (

setFieldValue("imagem", file)}
)} /> ) } } export default Adduserfun;
